jd: From: Jitendra Upreity, Technocraft solutions jitendra@technocraftsol.com Reply to: jitendra@technocraftsol.com Job Title: Business Analyst 5Location: Lansing, MI (Hybrid)Duration: 12 Months Contract Note: **** Hybrid Schedule: **Lansing, MI. Resource will be working a hybrid schedule. NO REMOTE ONLY OPTION. Will need to be onsite from day 1, two days a week***Local candidates (strongly preferred) or non-local (must be willing to relocate at their own expense from acceptance with no delays & follow the onsite/hybrid schedule) Responsibilities and Skills: Job ID: MI-135503 Location: Lansing, MI (DTMB)Duration: 12 Months Complete Description: Extrapolate datasets from Service Desk Support Team and prepare using appropriate algorithm tools Ability to obtain and report data analysis of datasets Facilitate meetings to discuss data analysis of workloads and projects Excellent interpersonal skills Skills, Experience and Education:Bachelor’s Degree, RequiredOrganization and Prioritization skills are MandatoryUnderstanding CRISP-DM process modelAbility to follow the steps for a data mining projecto Business Understandingo Data understandingo Data preparationo Modelingo Evaluationo Deployment Communication and Interpersonal skills are MandatoryPrevious experience working with multiple agencies and/or vendors and/or departments in an enterprise environmentare RequiredMinimum 1-3 years’ experience with PBI, R, IBM SPSS, and/or TableauMinimum 3-5 years’ experience with Microsoft Project and Excel is RequiredMinimum 2-3 years’ experience with DevOps is PreferredMinimum 3-5 years’ experience with Remedy/Helix is RequiredMinimum 3-5 years working within a Telecommunications environment is PreferredMinimum 3-5 years’ experience in a large Enterprise setting is RequiredMinimum 3-5 years’ work experience with multiple network platforms is PreferredMinimum 3-5 years working with multiple network lines of service is RequiredMinimum 5+ years dealing with customers is Required. Justification: Provide presentations, reports, statistics, metrics, and analysis of services provided by Network ServicesShort Description: Receive, process, present data, and information from our weekly Helix datasets which are providedfrom another I&O division.
